abstract: Autopsy from Lake County, Ill, coroner's office reports Justus Howell, 17-year-old black teenager killed by Zion police, was shot twice in the back; Howell's relatives seek answers and ask NAACP for help.
lead_paragraph: An autopsy shows that a teenager killed by a police officer in Zion over the weekend was shot twice in the back, the authorities said Monday.

headline.main: Illinois: Teenager Killed by Police Was Shot Twice in the Back
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Teenager Killed By Police Was Shot Twice In the Back

snippet: An autopsy shows that a teenager killed by a police officer in Zion over the weekend was shot twice in the back, the authorities said Monday.

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
